name: Instigate Application Framework
short_description:
Instigate Application Framework provides software development methodology supported by development tools and libraries for cost effective development of high quality desktop applications with focus on CAD applications.
Main benefit of Instigate Application Framework is genericity and non-intrusiveness. Framework does not enforce its own database upon application developer, but provides API to register user database and algorithms.
The Graphical User Interface and the Command Line Interface is generated automatically by the Framework based on the registered data.
The registration API also provides means to enter description of user data which is used for generation of high quality standard-compliant Reference Manual for the application.
Registered database is wrapped into a scripting interface to enable of automatic generation of black-box tests.
summary: Software libraries for effective development of desktop applications.
